Text:
You, for one, NEVER need apologise for anything. More than anyone I know, you, with the help of TPB, have made my life infinitely more interesting and fun.
I wish i could help you resolve the hassle. Cheers, Synnott.

User Type: t access.  Had no idea WHAT email address I used and finally had a moderator come to my rescue.

Date: there's been the harassment from various ISPs who have closed my account or blocked my access to TPB.  I wasn't sure if the inability to log on was my password or the ISP playing tricks.

User Type: Now I'm using a service that makes me anonymous online.  To hell with the ISP.  "
